name: Navori Quickblades
passive: Transcendence: Your attacks reduce your non-ultimate ability cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldown (per critical strike).
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Ability Haste, Attack Speed. Passive effect: Your attacks reduce your non-ultimate ability cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldown (per critical strike).. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
Consider building this when ahead to snowball your advantage
Excellent for champions who rely on basic attacks
Helps with last hitting and taking objectives faster
